context.text: ;; A skillful professional vs an inexperienced amateur in a fairly judged cooking competition.
;; A skillful professional who is having an off day vs the winner of a local amateur cooking competition in a fairly judged cooking competition.
;; A mediocre semi-professional chef vs a gifted inexperienced amateur chef in a fairly judged cooking competition.
;; A mediocre semi-professional chef vs a talented novice in a fairly judged cooking competition.
;; A local novice cooking champion vs a skilled semi-professional chef in a fairly judged cooking competition.
